questions.question: What is the predominant color displayed on the primary surface of the product?
What is the overall shape of the presented product packaging?
What material appears to constitute the outer layer of this product's packaging?
Considering the image, what brand name is prominently featured on the packaging?
What secondary brand is visible on the product's packaging, positioned near the bottom right?
What kind of text is predominantly displayed across the back of the package?
What type of code is printed at the bottom of the back of the package?
What is the general texture of the product's packaging surface, as visually interpreted?
What is the overall finish of the visible surface, gloss or matte?
What is the orientation of the primary text block on the product's packaging?
Is the color shade of the packaging a light or dark blue?
Does the packaging display any images apart from logos or text?
What is the language of the primary text visible on the back of the product?
Does the product packaging show any significant wear or damage?
Is there any embossing or raised printing visible on the packaging surface?
